title: Champion Masteries
body:
Hey guys, 

With the new season up and coming will champion mastery levels and chests reset? If so, if and when will that happen? If not, great. Let me know if you have any thoughts on the subject or if anybody has concrete proof of either yes or no.

replies.body:
Champion masteries will not be reset, but chests will reset next season so you can earn all those goodies!

Let me know if you have any other questions.
champion masteries wont be reset as it has nothing to do with ranked gameplay so no it wont be reset and u wont lose them.
